TopicTitle: today i'm streaming KSP for the first time!

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone ! i finally made my own channel after a long time of just watching other streamers, and i'm going to be streaming today at 5:00pm to ~7:30pm !![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

i don't really know what to do in KSP at my channel today, so i thought i should make vote ! (i'v been playing KSP for over a year, so anything is possible ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif))

so tell me what you think i should do from the following list:

1. continue my moderate career game (rescue valentina who is stuck on the mun XD)

2. play sandbox(if you choose me to play sandbox, you can also say what you think i should do, like 'build a mining base on Vall' or make a space station around moho')

3. any other ideas you guys have!

i hope to see (not really see..) you guys at my channel tonight ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)!

my channel: [http://www.twitch.tv/shawn28wt](http://www.twitch.tv/shawn28wt)

i didn't know where to post this thread, so i just posted it here.

-Shawn.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-17T18:42:12Z" title="05/17/2015 06:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 17, 2015</time> by Shawn28**
What timezone you in? Because it can't be 5:00 PM for everybody at the same time, of course.
oops XD forgot about that... i'm in Eastern Time zone
i'm starting in a few minutes...
